languages.text: {n}В вашей памяти очень некстати пробуждаются воспоминания о том, как вы возвращались с планетарной вылазки, на которой бездонная пропасть похитила у вас Хейнрикса... или все же вы ей его отдали?{/n}
{n}Your mind chooses this inopportune moment to remind you of the planetary expedition on which Heinrix was snatched from you by the bottomless chasm... or did you surrender him to it?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В вашей памяти очень некстати пробуждаются воспоминания о том, как вы возвращались с планетарной вылазки, на которой бездонная пропасть похитила у вас Хейнрикса... или все же вы ей его отдали?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your mind chooses this inopportune moment to remind you of the planetary expedition on which Heinrix was snatched from you by the bottomless chasm... or did you surrender him to it?{/n}
{n}Your mind chooses this inopportune moment to remind you of the planetary expedition on which Heinrix was snatched from you by the bottomless chasm... or did you surrender him to it?{/n}
{n}Your mind chooses this inopportune moment to remind you of the planetary expedition on which Heinrix was snatched from you by the bottomless chasm... or did you surrender him to it?{/n}
{n}Your mind chooses this inopportune moment to remind you of the planetary expedition on which Heinrix was snatched from you by the bottomless chasm... or did you surrender him to it?{/n}

languages.text: {n}在这个不恰当的时机，你的脑海中突然浮现出了那场行星探险。海因里希就是在那个时候落入了无底深渊……还是说，是你把他献祭给了深渊？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your mind chooses this inopportune moment to remind you of the planetary expedition on which Heinrix was snatched from you by the bottomless chasm... or did you surrender him to it?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在这个不恰当的时机，你的脑海中突然浮现出了那场行星探险。海因里希就是在那个时候落入了无底深渊……还是说，是你把他献祭给了深渊？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu mente elige un momento especialmente inoportuno para recordarte la expedición planetaria en la que el abismo sin fondo te arrebató a Heinrix... ¿o fuiste tú quien lo entregó voluntariamente?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your mind chooses this inopportune moment to remind you of the planetary expedition on which Heinrix was snatched from you by the bottomless chasm... or did you surrender him to it?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu mente elige un momento especialmente inoportuno para recordarte la expedición planetaria en la que el abismo sin fondo te arrebató a Heinrix... ¿o fuiste tú quien lo entregó voluntariamente?{/n}

languages.text: {n}こんな時に脳裏をよぎったのは、惑星探査をしていたときにハインリックスが底なしの亀裂にさらわれたことだ…それとも彼が落ちるがままにして見捨てたのだろうか？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your mind chooses this inopportune moment to remind you of the planetary expedition on which Heinrix was snatched from you by the bottomless chasm... or did you surrender him to it?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}こんな時に脳裏をよぎったのは、惑星探査をしていたときにハインリックスが底なしの亀裂にさらわれたことだ…それとも彼が落ちるがままにして見捨てたのだろうか？{/n}

languages.text: {n}In diesem ungeeigneten Augenblick erinnert dein Gehirn dich an die Planetenexpedition, bei der dieser bodenlose Abgrund dir Heinrix entrissen hat ... oder hast du ihn ihm übergeben?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your mind chooses this inopportune moment to remind you of the planetary expedition on which Heinrix was snatched from you by the bottomless chasm... or did you surrender him to it?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In diesem ungeeigneten Augenblick erinnert dein Gehirn dich an die Planetenexpedition, bei der dieser bodenlose Abgrund dir Heinrix entrissen hat ... oder hast du ihn ihm übergeben?{/n}

languages.text: {n}C'est à ce moment précis que votre esprit décide de faire défiler devant vos yeux les images de cette expédition planétaire pendant laquelle Heinrix s'est retrouvé précipité dans un abîme sans fond... ou l'y auriez-vous poussé ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your mind chooses this inopportune moment to remind you of the planetary expedition on which Heinrix was snatched from you by the bottomless chasm... or did you surrender him to it?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}C'est à ce moment précis que votre esprit décide de faire défiler devant vos yeux les images de cette expédition planétaire pendant laquelle Heinrix s'est retrouvé précipité dans un abîme sans fond... ou l'y auriez-vous poussé ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zihnin, bu hiç uygun olmayan anda sana oyunlar oynuyor. Heinrix'in dipsiz yarıkta senden koparıldığı gezegen keşfini hatırlıyorsun. Yoksa onu sen mi yarığa teslim etmiştin?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your mind chooses this inopportune moment to remind you of the planetary expedition on which Heinrix was snatched from you by the bottomless chasm... or did you surrender him to it?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zihnin bu hiç uygun olmayan anda sana oyunlar oynuyor ve Heinrix'in dipsiz uçurumda senden koptuğu gezegen keşfini hatırlıyorsun. Ya da onu oraya sen mi teslim etmiştin?{/n}
